name: TAPTAP Networks
tagline: Global Platform For Mobile Audience Engagement
description: TAPTAP Networks through its Sonata audience engagement platform, delivers brand-safe hyper local awareness and results for national and global advertisers. Built mobile-first by former retailers and ad tech experts, TAPTAP's technology leverages digital browsing and outdoor or indoor presence signals to effectively build audience profiles based on physical and digital behavior. TAPTAP is capable of measuring both digital and physical attribution of any campaign delivered through Sonata.
